channel.title: Biodiversity on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Biodiversity on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for Ecology and Biodiversity Monitoring
item.description:
What you can do

  • Record species, abundance, and habitats
  • Map plots and transects with accurate GNSS
  • Attach photos and notes for QA

Integrated with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Share projects and manage permissions in QFieldCloud. Export to standard formats for analysis.
